channel.title: Is this a client or server error?
channel.description: This kid logs in on my client he downloaded. He gets to click twice and then after he clicks again itll close out the client. It doesn't do that to anyone else. Whats wrong?

item.title: Is this a client or server error?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

He downloaded and its still happening.
Ahhhh its fine now.
We fixed it.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this a client or server error?
